episodes.title: New Allegations against John of God
episodes.description:
In 2006, a 65 year old German woman Hannalore Bode who decried John of God as a fraud was found dead in the street next to the Casa, where the medium performs his brand of spiritual surgery. Original Abadiania Police reports indicate normal death. Though later investigation states gunshot to the face? In light of John of God's recent arrest for various crimes, a new witness has come forward. This brutal murder case is being reopened by authorities without connection to JoG.

Giulio Ferrari investigated 12 of Brazil's worst psychopaths, but nothing him prepared for John of God. This is the most cruel and out of the ordinary psychopath our generation has ever seen in relation to trafficking in people, including children.

Giulio Ferrari was on of the first to gather information and women together to expose Serial Rapist and Fake Faith Healing John of God of Brazil, 2018. Giulio Ferrari has continued to work tirelessly for victims of abuse.Report here:

episodes.title: Zahira Lieneke Mous vs Sexual Predator John of God
episodes.description:
Zahira Lieneke Mous statements to Brazil's Globo G1, 12/11/2018

This little Dutch young woman was the first to stand up and oppose the so called spiritual Goliath of Brazil. To "open the door for all the abused women and GIRLS" 
Globally endorsed and promoted by Oprah Winfrey as a miraculous spiritual healer and Man of God.John of God was considered a 'BIG MAN'.  Many were taken in by Oprah's false advertisements and flocked to John of God's center in Abadiania, Brazil. Not reported at the time by Oprah were these facts: John of God was already multi millionaire dealing in illegal businesses of money laundering and smuggling. He owned considerable real estate in Abadiania and controlled this small backwoods town. His 'spiritual' act was nothing more than a charade. And worse of all, he used his power and influence to sexual abuse hundreds of women and children.

Zahira was the first woman to report publicly to have been sexually abused by psychic John of God. A real HERO. 

Her statement:
"I'm really relieved to know how many women have come forward since the show. So, I am feeling very positive about that because that's the reason I decided to give the interview in the first place. It was to open a door for all the abused women and GIRLS to come forward.. And  that's happening.

Link to Interview:
https://g1.globo.com/mundo/noticia/2018/12/11/estou-aliviada-de-saber-quantas-mulheres-se-apresentaram-diz-holandesa-que-denunciou-joao-de-deus-por-abuso-sexual.ghtml

Dutch report: REPO Dec18, 2018
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1_sKFWflEgM

Full Dec 6 , 2018 interview with Bial Globo TV. at 2:34 story of John of God's spiritual ECTOPLASM!
https://globoplay.globo.com/v/7218670/?fbclid=IwAR05TUr-qSTE_Y2SxlVgFXU--DvCB2-EQ71Vup7FeY6ONLS9SZEiVujzCrA

episodes.title: John of God Sex Abuse Interview
episodes.description:
Brazilian Globo TV's 'Conversation with Bial' aired December 6,2018. Interview with former John of God follower Zahira Lieneke Mous and 'Casa' guide Amy Biank identifying a pattern of sexual abuse and intimidation at John of God's spiritual center in Abadiania, Brazil. This broadcast interview was the first of more than 500 complaints of sexual abuse, rape, sodomy and pedophilia to come forward. On December 16,2018 John of God was arrested. He has been denied bail and remains in jail  to await trial. Investigations follow regarding other illegal activities of money laundering, smuggling, possession of illegal weapons. The Brazil Court froze his assets to the amount of 50 million $R. The decision aims to guarantee compensation for possible collective damages and individual damages suffered by the victims. 

Court blocks 50 Million of John of God'd assets. 1/9/2018 from R7
https://noticias.r7.com/brasil/justica-bloqueia-r-50-milhoes-em-dinheiro-e-imoveis-de-joao-de-deus-09012019

Zahira Mous response to outpouring of sex abuse claims: Globo G1 12/11/2018

episodes.title: Oprah Interview with John of God, before Sex Abuse Charges
episodes.description:
This fluff piece video interview by Oprah aired  in March 2013. It was highly uncritical to promote John of God as a 'Miracle Healer' and divine man who could channel spirits. In light of Dec 2018 Sex abuse charges ( over 300 women) against John of God, Oprah removed all traces of her connection with John of God from her OWN and Oprah.com sites. This remains as a testament to the truth.
